price: ይህ የአላህ ፍጡር ነው፡፡ እነዚያ ከእርሱ ሌላ ያሉት ምንን እንደፈጠሩ እስኪ አሳዩኝ፡፡ በእውነቱ በዳዮቹ በግልጽ ጥመት ውስጥ ናቸው፡፡
arabic: هَٰذَا خَلۡقُ ٱللَّهِ فَأَرُونِي مَاذَا خَلَقَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن دُونِهِۦۚ بَلِ ٱلظَّٰلِمُونَ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: hādhā khalqu al-lahi fa-arūnī mādhā khalaqa alladhīna min dūnihi bali al-ẓālimūna fī ḍalālin mubīnin
